capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met a female before, so this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is a great example of a strong and intelligent character in the Harry Potter series. I think she's an amazing role model for young girls everywhere, don't you?
